name: Index Dolt MemoryBlocks into LlamaIndex
description: Using the memory_block_to_node function and LlamaMemory, add a sync loop that indexes MemoryBlocks retrieved from Dolt into the vector and graph stores. Validate that relationships and metadata are preserved.

implementation_details.output_target: LlamaIndex vector and graph stores via LlamaMemory

action_items: [ ] Add argument parsing for Dolt DB path and LlamaIndex storage path.
[ ] Initialize `LlamaMemory` instance with the specified path.
[ ] Call `dolt_reader.read_memory_blocks` to retrieve blocks from Dolt.
[ ] For each block, call `llama_memory.add_block(block)` to index it.
[ ] Add logging to indicate progress and completion.
[ ] Consider adding logic to handle potential errors during indexing of individual blocks.
[ ]   Setup: Create test Dolt DB, add sample blocks (including one with links).
[ ]   Execute: Run the `sync_dolt_to_llamaindex.py` script against the test DB and a temporary LlamaIndex path.
[ ]   Verify: Query the resulting LlamaIndex stores (vector and graph) to confirm blocks and relationships were indexed correctly.
test_criteria: [ ] Integration test successfully indexes blocks from a test Dolt DB into LlamaIndex.
[ ] Test verifies that vector queries return the indexed blocks.
[ ] Test verifies that graph relationships (using `get_rel_map` or `get_backlinks`) match the links defined in the Dolt data.
[ ] Script runs without errors on valid input.
success_criteria: [ ] A script exists that can synchronize `MemoryBlock` data from Dolt into the LlamaIndex system.
[ ] Both vector embeddings and graph relationships are correctly indexed in LlamaIndex based on the Dolt source data.
